alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 12:46PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Worcester, southeastern Hampshire, southeastern Franklin and northeastern Hampden Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1246 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Belchertown, or near Amherst, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Chicopee, Holyoke, Amherst, Northampton, Ludlow, South Hadley, Holden, Auburn, Easthampton, Belchertown, Wilbraham, Oxford, Millbury, Charlton, Palmer, Spencer, Leicester, Ware and Sturbridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester
